name: Deep_Dive
description:
Need to go into the Dry Deep well to discover and unlock the treasure at the bottom. Going into the depths is possible only by jumping thru the moving platforms and picking up the keys on the way. Beware of the spikes and the zombies who are there to kill you ! Mind you, there is only 1 life.

·      Keys are available in the side walls. Need to collect atleast 10 keys on the way to ensure to open up the treasure 

       chest at the floor of the well.

·      Jump over the spikes to avoid them.

·      Avoid colliding into the zombies. They don’t move.

·      Beware of jumping out too deep at a stretch. You could get killed. Suggest moving Platform by Platform.

·      Remember. There are no Lives. Game has to restart if player dies.

·      Normal Movement keys. Spacebar to Jump and LeftShift to attack.

Can you really get that deep alive ?
